reviewText: We have enjoyed this dvd many times, as a background for various evening activities. The music is beautiful.
THIS IS A MUST HAVE CONCERT WITH THE SINGERS OF THE BOY CHOIR AND OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCES BY SIEGFRIED JERUSALEM AND JOCHEN KOWALSKI.
Wonderful Christmas concert from Germany. The countertenor is superb! Recorded at the Schauspielhaus in Berlin and featuring the Tlzer Knabenchor and others performing beautiful carols.
What I received was a CD of Christmas elevator type music, not a DVD Christmas concert.  I will need to return it.
